title: ICE: const-generics-demangling.rs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: const-generics-blocking
labels.description: An issue blocking the stabilisation of `min_const_generics`

body:
reduced from `./src/test/ui/symbol-names/const-generics-demangling.rs` ### Code ```Rust #![feature(min_const_generics, rustc_attrs)] pub struct Unsigned; #[rustc_symbol_name] impl Unsigned<11> {} fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.49.0-nightly (1eaadebb3 2020-10-21) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1eaadebb3dee31669c7649b32747381d11614fae commit-date: 2020-10-21 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.49.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_symbol_mangling/src/legacy.rs:41:21: finding type for DefId(0:6 ~ const_generics_demangling[317d]::{impl#0}), encountered def-id DefId(0:0 ~ const_generics_demangling[317d]) with no parent thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:945:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.49.0-nightly (1eaadebb3 2020-10-21) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu query stack during panic: #0 [symbol_name] computing the symbol for `Unsigned::<11_u8>` end of query stack thread '' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `LLVMing`, right: `Codegenning`', /rustc/1eaadebb3dee31669c7649b32747381d11614fae/compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/back/write.rs:1423:21 error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.49.0-nightly (1eaadebb3 2020-10-21) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu query stack during panic: end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_symbol_mangling/src/legacy.rs:41:21: finding type for DefId(0:6 ~ const_generics_demangling[317d]::{impl#0}), encountered def-id DefId(0:0 ~ const_generics_demangling[317d]) with no parent thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:945:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f3c7942da10 -
